participant_1.background: my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures. i am an elementary school teacher. i am fluent in english, spanish, and french.

participant_2.name: Mohamed
participant_2.personality: Reflective and hopeful, he shares his life experiences openly and values family connections.
participant_2.background: i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was 16. my aunt helped me escape when i was 20.

content.text: hi, i like to live in USA
i was born in somalia and i have to escape to USA
now iam very happy and can live by myself, and a have a wonderfull wife, name is marry
i had very bad times in pat, but everthing is paased away
now i m happy for every single day
my aunt come every year to visiting us from somalia, she helped me for escaping from somalia, she is my second mother
what do u like, do u working?
U not interrested to talk with me, doesnt matter..
